description: Conversion of loft into one studio flat, involving two rear roof extensions and installation of 3 No rooflights in  front roofslope.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number PL02B.  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing building and those as described on the plans.  Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(g), 3.1(b) and 3.8 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2011). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995, no additionally windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the extensions permitted.  Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7.6 of the London Plan (2011), policies 7B and Local variation to policy 7.4 Local Character of the Ealing Draft Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1(g), 3.1(b) and 3.8 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012).
